captions.text:
- Poop, poop for me, poop
for daddy, uugghh poop.

Oh god, he peed, he
peed, he must have peed.
Oh he peed, he peed, he peed, he peed.

Eat the food so you
don't eat my food later.
Why are you eating grass, are you a cow?

Look at me, look at me,
look at me (camera click)
Yah, oh my god hold, hold (camera click)
Pesto, drop it, drop it, drop it Pesto.

Oh my god who's the
smartest puppy in the world?
Cha cha cha cha cha woo!
This is really bad, I'm so mad at you.
Hey you are not listening to me.
- No, your dog is the cutest puppy.
No don't eat it, don't eat it, oh god...
Oh my god I'm so sorry, sorry, sorry.
No pull your leash that way.
I knew it you couldn't eat the bacon.

We're not buying any
more of that shit are we.
Nope, nope, come on come back.
Here' we go-- Pesto, Pesto, come back.
See see see, trust me it feels good.
It's not a problem at all.
Aww Pesto look, look at the puppies.
Hmm, maybe I should get another dog?
Do you want a little brother?

This is some sick form
of revenge, isn't it?

- I don't really like dogs
I'm more of a cat person.

title: Weird Things All Dog Owners Do

shore and doggie paddles all over the place she loves it!,﻿

comments.text:
My dog is a jokester, he hides behind doors or around corners waiting. I'll 
have my back turned or walking down the hallway and he'll just jump from 
where he was hiding, bark, then runs off. He's scared the crap out of me a 
few times like that. A few times I've turned the tables act like I don't 
notice him, turn around yelling and wave my hands. He thinks it's a game 
and I can imagine I look like a crazy woman.﻿

Dogs eats grass to make their stomach more balanced, its good for them to 
eat grass sometimes :) and repeting sit 4 times wil eventually make the 
comando sit x4 instead of just sit. i recomend to read about dogs before

towels x)﻿
